arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned by AWS to this lifecycle configuration.

name.description: The name of the lifecycle configuration (must be unique). If omitted, this provider will assign a random, unique name.

onCreate.description: A shell script (base64-encoded) that runs only once when the SageMaker Notebook Instance is created.

onStart.description: A shell script (base64-encoded) that runs every time the SageMaker Notebook Instance is started including the time it's created.

name.description: The name of the lifecycle configuration (must be unique). If omitted, this provider will assign a random, unique name.

onCreate.description: A shell script (base64-encoded) that runs only once when the SageMaker Notebook Instance is created.

onStart.description: A shell script (base64-encoded) that runs every time the SageMaker Notebook Instance is started including the time it's created.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering NotebookInstanceLifecycleConfiguration resources.
